page.title: 10 Religion in Cwmbran
page.content:
There are eleven places of worship in the grid area. 28.3% of the children in Brookfield School attend a Sunday School at one of these places. St. Gabriel's Sunday School starts at 11.00 a.m. every Sunday. There are 30 children and we read books and make pictures. The Salvation Army holds services every day and we sing hymns and the band plays. There are seven classes in the Sunday School and they are always well attended. David Periam does not go to Sunday Schoolbecause he likes to lie in bed on Sunday mornings, and by the time he gets up and has his breakfast, Sunday School is finished.
Written by Jason Ryan, Alison Talbot & David Periam (Brookfield)
